Package org.esupportail.commons.services.smtp

esup-commons SMTP features.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SmtpService The interface of SMTP services, used to send emails.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSmtpService An abstract implementation of SmtpService that does not support tests.
AsynchronousSmtpServiceImpl An implementation of SmtpService that sends emails asynchronously to prevent from rendering timetouts.
MailSenderThread Send a mail to an InternetAddress throught an asynchroneous thread.
MessageIdChangingMimeMessage  
SimpleSmtpServiceImpl A simple implementation of SmtpService.
SmtpServer A class that represents SMTP servers.
SmtpUtils A class that provides utilities to send emails.
VoidSmtpServiceImpl An implementation of SmtpService that sends no email at all.
 

Exception Summary
SmtpException An class to represent the exceptions thrown when sendin mails.
 

Package org.esupportail.commons.services.smtp Description

esup-commons SMTP features.
